info.title: Project Management API
info.description: API for managing projects, timesheets, and attributes

get.description: Returns details of a specific attribute

post.description: Creates a new user account and returns an access token
Authenticates user and returns an access token

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's profile information
Returns paginated list of projects with their attributes

post.description: Creates a new project with attributes

get.description: Returns details of a specific project
Returns paginated list of timesheets with project and user details

403.description: Forbidden - User not assigned to project

get.description: Returns details of a specific timesheet
Returns details of a specific user
